name: Blockar.io
description:
If you want to try classic Snake in a new form with multiplayer mode you'll enjoy this game!
Now you can proove your skills in a contest with other players. Get more points than others! Eat all the apples, defeat your opponents by surrounding them with your tail. Beat all other players or just play for fun. Choose your own way to win the game!If you want to try classic Snake in a new form with multiplayer mode you'll enjoy this game!
Now you can proove your skills in a contest with other players. Get more points than others! Eat all the apples, defeat your opponents by surrounding them with your tail. Beat all other players or just play for fun. Choose your own way to win the game!
